headline: Former Ohio congressman Clarence Brown dies
author: Associated Press
sentences: URBANA, Ohio — Clarence “Bud” Brown Jr., a former congressman from Ohio and retired chairman of the defunct Brown Publishing Co., has died, according to a funeral home in his hometown.
The Republican was elected in 1965 to complete the congressional term of his father, U.S. Rep. Clarence J.
Visitation will be Tuesday and services the following day, according to Vernon Funeral Home.
Please, provide an email address to continue reading free articles
Brown, of Urbana, died at his home Wednesday.
